authority_boundary.scope: Invoice approval for vendor payments under 5000 USD
authority_boundary.maximum_impact: Single invoice approval up to 5000 USD
authority_boundary.escalation_trigger: Invoice above 5000 USD or disputed vendor

ambiguity_handling.why_this_placement: Financial impact requires human judgment when data is unclear.
ambiguity_handling.what_happens_while_waiting: Invoice held in queue; no action taken

contest_path.how_to_contest: Submit appeal via vendor portal with supporting docs

reversibility_plan.safe_stop: Disable auto-approval flag; all new invoices route to human

commit_points.name: before_payment_commit
commit_points.what_commits_here: Database write that marks invoice as approved

undo_strategy.details: Reverse approval and notify vendor; manual correction if payment already sent

runaway_guardrails: Max 10 approvals per hour per vendor

human_stop_authority.how: Toggle in admin dashboard or on-call runbook

plain_language.why: Within limit and vendor matched; no ambiguity
plain_language.what_it_relied_on: Vendor master data and invoice line items
plain_language.how_to_challenge: Submit appeal via vendor portal within 14 days
plain_language.how_to_undo_or_stop: Finance lead can reverse in admin

machine_readable.inputs_summary: Invoice INV-001, vendor V123, amount 3500 USD

ownership_and_escalation.escalation_rule: Contest received or error rate above 5%
ownership_and_escalation.on_call_expectation: Acknowledge within 1 hour; resolve or escalate within 24h
ownership_and_escalation.audit_cadence: Weekly review of contested and reversed decisions
